turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with placing an order at Bella Luna Pizzeria?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, let me get that started for you. what would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. what toppings did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have one cheese pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. I would like a thin crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. so the order is 2 large pizzas, both with thin crust, 1 cheese pizza, and 1 meat lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $35.39 is the total. did you want me to place the order for you now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, that would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the food will b ready in 35 minutes. i've sent the receipt to you via text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it today. Thank you so much for your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, you're very welcome. have a wonderful day.
